input_args.text: 'www.paranormalelite.com 9 \nA supposed dragon was recently caught on tape by a man in Los Angeles during a thunderstorm. The footage begins with a shot of overlooking the city and soon you can see lightning flashing in the clouds. While played in slow motion, a mysterious shape that resembles a real dragon can be seen in the clouds. Could this be actual video evidence of the existence of dragons? What do you think? Tags'
